title: Pricing for new Elementalist Lux skin (question for rioter)
body: I was wondering what the release price for elementalist lux will be, i'm trying to count my rp so i know how much i'll have left over after purchasing and would like to know what the release discount will be.

replies.body:
> [{quoted}](name=freedomgirl,realm=NA,application-id=osqw6G4M,discussion-id=rrX6BuKa,comment-id=0001,timestamp=2016-11-18T21:43:19.914+0000)
>
> price for lux skin is 3250

yes but typically skins recieve discounts on release, the question is what that discount will be

> [{quoted}](name=A Filthy Yandere,realm=NA,application-id=osqw6G4M,discussion-id=rrX6BuKa,comment-id=00010000,timestamp=2016-11-18T22:24:43.987+0000)
>
> yes but typically skins recieve discounts on release, the question is what that discount will be

there isnt a discount on this skin the only discount might be the ward and or icons in a bundle but the skin itself will be 3250 always your only hope is the bundle has a lower price for the ward which would be 640 rp and the icon which i believe you get most of the icons by buying the skin itself except the last one of her illuminosity symbol which should be 1500 ip

I'm not a part of the skins or marketing teams, so I really have no idea.  I also don't have information to provide on content that hasn't been released.  Bookmark our [News](http://na.leagueoflegends.com/en/news/) page to stay up to date on any new details.  Adapt and hang tight until there's more info!
